alert.note: Alert for Brazoria; Fort Bend; Galveston (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 6:00PM CDT until September 25 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Galveston County in southeastern Texas... East central Fort Bend County in southeastern Texas... Northeastern Brazoria County in southeastern Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 600 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pearland, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pearland, southwestern League City, southwestern Friendswood, Alvin, Santa Fe, Manvel, Fresno, Arcola, Brookside Village, Iowa Colony, Hillcrest, and Liverpool. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
